title: Broken project download links fixed
summary: Just fixed the download links on these projects: RssDisplay, ShowReferers, GoogleToRSS. Just took me awhile to circle back around to it, ugh. So if you were ever interested in those projects, please try grabbing them again for ridicule. :)
